name: Royal Sunangel
description:
This sustainable braided circle scarf is made from a modal sweater knit fabric and is a beautiful rich royal blue.

This modal sweater knit fabric feels amazing next to your skin and is unbelievably soft and cozy for the cold winter months.

I buy all my fabric from manufacturers & designers that have production overstock that would otherwise end up being thrown away in landfills. All fabric is production quality, sustainable & hand made.

This unique scarf is a perfect gift to give someone, or buy it for yourself to add some color to your wardrobe!

Each scarf is 60" in circumference

Hand wash/Lay flat to dry

name: Venezuelan Sylph
description:
This sustainable circle scarf is made from a jersey blend.  This missoni inspired print has a beautiful berry, purple, black, blue tones.  it's super soft and very light-weight.  This print is a must for fall.

All fabric is overstock from designers and manufacturers that if not used would end up in landfills. You are getting awesome production quality fabric and helping the planet out one step at a time.

60" in circumference; can be looped once, or twice around the neck.
total width is 32"


Hand wash/ Lay flat to dry

name: Beautiful Hummingbird
description:
This sustainable braided circle scarf is made from a sweater knit and has a vibrant fuchsia color that is perfect for the winter!  This scarf is a cozy option for someone who wants to stay warm in the winter and add some color to their wardrobe.

All fabric is from overstock from manufacturers and designers that would end up in landfills if not used.

All fabric is production quality, so you are getting fabric that has amazing quality & texture. Every piece is handmade by me and is 100% Sustainable!

Each scarf is 60" in circumference

Hand wash/Lay flat to dry

name: Peruvian Piedtail
description:
This sustainable eco cashmere circle scarf is made from a modal blended sweater knit fabric and is a beautiful tan color.

This fabric feels like cashmere, and is an incredibly cozy circle scarf.  This is by far a must scarf for the winter months.  I made this scarf slightly wider, to emphasize the coziness! This will keep you warm, and is a great basic scarf for your closet.

I buy all my fabric from manufacturers & designers that have production overstock that would otherwise end up being thrown away in landfills. All fabric is production quality, sustainable & hand made.

This unique scarf is a perfect gift to give someone, or buy it for yourself to add some color to your wardrobe!

Each scarf is 60" in circumference/ 38" wide

Hand wash/Lay flat to dry

**Did you know that Rayon is a cellulosic fiber made from wood pulp in the same manner as bamboo
